items.name: Success - Business and Professional Services WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Success is a professional WordPress theme that's ideal for Business Consulting and Professional Services firms looking to provide advice and guidance to potential clients.

items.description:
Can I see the online documentation?
You can view all of the theme’s documentation, including the install guide right here.

Do I get the images used on the demo site?
No, these were sourced from shutterstock.com and cannot be distributed within the theme. It’s intended you use your own to put your own stamp on the design. For free images, check out the excellent unsplash.com

Does Success come with a page builder?
Yes, it comes with WPBakery, the most popular drag-and-drop page builder plugin for WordPress that comes free with the theme. It allows you to build fully custom pages by mixing and matching the existing elements.

Can I use the theme on multiple sites with a single purchase?
Nothing will stop you, but note that each license can be activated on one WordPress site at a time. You will get updates and support for the one you activate.

Why is Success right for you?

  • We’ve researched your industry – After spending many hours studying dozens of the best Business Consulting and Professonal Services websites we wanted to create a best in class theme for Business Consulting businesses.
  • Easy to use! – before we made themes for a living we bought them just like you. We grew tired and frustrated of themes that we’re impossible to figure out how to use. Our customers love how we setup our themes to be easy to manage and intuitive to figure out in minutes. Thousands of happy customers have told us we’re doing it right!
  • Setup in minutes! – you can quickly recreate a website similar to our demo site in minutes using our one click installer. Don’t waste hours reading manuals to get up and running – get your website built faster so you can start selling today.
  • Best in class, super fast code! – we take code quality very seriously. Our themes load like lightning which is so important for small businesses.
  • Optimized for SEO – Success is fully compatible with the leading SEO plugin on the market, Yoast SEO and passes Google’s Structured Data Testing Test Tool.
  • World class support! – when you do need help we’re here for you. Our customers rave about our world class support team.

Overview

  • WordPress 5+ Ready
  • 100% focused on world class design best practices
  • Perfect design and features for any consulting and professional services business!
  • Fully Responsive! Strong focus on the smartphone and tablet experience
  • Unlimited Color and Typography options
  • CommerceGurus Toolkit – our very own WordPress plugin included to enhance WordPress
  • Step by Step Video Guides
  • Detailed Documentation
  • Child theme friendly
  • 5 Star Rated Elite ThemeForest Authors
  • World Class Support

Layout Features

  • Boxed or Full Width Layout
  • Mobile friendly and Retina-ready design
  • Sticky Header Option
  • WPBakery included worth $46!
  • Beautifully designed Shortcodes
  • Left, Right or no Sidebars on the News Template
  • Use Background Photos or patterns

Header Features

  • Adjust the height of the Logo and Header
  • Change the Colors to match your brand
  • Change the typography with loads of Theme Options
  • LayerSlider included worth $25!
  • Create Unlimited Sliders

Pages

  • Contact Page
  • About Page and beautiful pages to help attract world class people to work in your business
  • Solutions
  • Customer Stories
  • Left and Right Sidebar Options
  • Testimonials

EASY TO CUSTOMIZE

  • Background Photo and Pattern Uploader
  • Change the Colors to match your Brand
  • Show 2 Footers or just 1
  • Fully Customizable Design: set your Color and Font for each Typographic Selector
  • Built-in Google Fonts. Over 650 Web Fonts support with Preview

AND ALSO…

  • SEO Optimized HOT
  • Child Theme Support
  • Bootstrap 3 Grid
  • 404 Error Page
  • Unlimited Contact forms with JS Validation HOT
  • Video Tutorials and Demo Data

One Click Demo Data Install

Installing the Success theme demo data takes just minutes allowing you to get up and running in no time at all. The sample images are not included in the theme due to copyright reasons and are replaced with grey placeholders.

Updating the theme

See the theme update guide here. Be sure and follow each step.

items.description:
Adios | Portfolio WordPress Theme for Artists, Agencies, Freelancers & Creatives

Adios is a design-driven, aesthetically sophisticated & technically proficient portfolio WordPress theme. Built with visual composer (Drag & Drop interface), this theme puts the power to mold & shape your website in your hands. Adios is entirely responsive, and it works well on tablets, smartphones, and desktop computers. With 9+ homepage layouts and a stack of portfolio options, you are guaranteed to get a bang for your buck. You can literally build portfolio site of any niche with this stunning theme. This is not only the best way to show off your creative style, but also a flexible platform to market your wares & impress your clients, too. It is, of course, retina ready and boasts super high-resolution graphics. Theme documentation is very extensive and informative, enough to turn any newbie into an experienced user. The same principle of adaptability applies to devices as well.

Why Adios?

Adios is a minimal, clean and modern WordPress theme for anyone who wants to build an amazing & modern portfolio website. It is suitable for any corporate, creative freelancer or business agency. You can get portfolio websites of any niche designed with Adios. This theme is crafted with care for each pixel and consists of well-organized PSD files.

Adios WordPress Theme – An Overview

Customizer – The Customizer is a framework for live-previewing any change to WordPress. It provides a simple and consistent interface for users to customize various aspects of their theme and their site, from colors and layouts to widgets, menus, and more.

Responsive – Almost every new client these days wants a mobile version of their website. It’s practically essential after all: one design for the BlackBerry, another for the iPhone, the iPad, netbook, Kindle and all screen resolutions must be compatible, too. So, don’t be worry about obtaining these sets of features, we do already have included in Adios. Let’s test it.

Typography – It’s the small details that make a project shine. Solid typography, well-crafted with attention and care is one of them. A harmonious visual rhythm, typographic subtleties like soft caps, margin outdents or the correct use of hyphens and dashes; there are a lot of things that add up to it. So, we do have included all google font sets just to make easy and useful, you can adjust color, size, line-height and so on.

Page Builder – Our customers have endless possibility to make layout as they want, we do have included visual composer plugin to add block of shortcodes to page, just drag and drop.

Shortcodes – Adios includes tons of shortcodes to make endless layout. With Adios, we’ve built 33 shortcodes, allowing you to build virtually any layout your mind can imagine. All shortcodes are included via a custom built plugin. Included shortcodes are as follows:

items.description:
Mariage is a completely beautiful and graphically amazing, extremely resourceful and very unique and memorable, luminous and bright, colorful and vibrant, aesthetically charming and enticing and very professional and reliable, well-structured and feature-rich responsive WordPress wedding and events website theme. Mariage is a gorgeous and very carefully developed the theme that has been designed with the utmost attention to every nook and cranny, in order to make a completely pixel perfect, Retina ready theme that couples can delight in or webmasters in general can rely on to make professional quality event websites of any nature whatsoever.

Mariage is packed with several handy page templates so you can hit the ground running with a number of standard fare website pages, all fully customizable through the WPBakery Page Builder and using the potent built-in Revolution Slider. Mariage is also WPML ready, so that your website truly has a global reach, on top of being wholly responsive, so that global reach can be accessed beautifully by devices and platforms across the board. With the Events Calendar plugin, it has never been easier to set the date in a public statement, and with WooCommerce integration, there really is no end to what you can do with Mariage!

ONE CLICK DEMO IMPORT

All of the beautiful pre-made , homepages, demos, templates and page setups you can see here in the Live Preview, are ready to be yours at the simple click of a button. items.description:
LaForat is a Gardening and Landscaping WordPress theme made specifically for businesses that provide services related to garden decoration and lawn care. It provides you with an attractive layout that is designed by keeping in mind to promote a business venture related to landscaping and lawn designing.

The theme provides quick access to the various sections of the website, viz. Home, Services, Gallery, Blog and Contact, and is accessible from all pages. This approach not only reduces data consumption and loading time on the client side but also increases the usability of the website

LaForat Theme has the beautiful and unique design that will be best suited for your online web presence. It has 100% responsive design and tested on all major handheld devices.

WHY SHOULD YOU CHOOSE LAFORAT?

LaForat is a full-on business theme specifically for gardeners and landscape adepts. The idea behind LaForat theme is for it to function as a bridge between your services but also business operations. One of the ways to illustrate this the best is that LaForat includes a fully optimized shopping solution within the core of this template. So, instead of providing only services related to this niche, you can also promote products. The clean quality of design shines the best when you observe some of the unique features.

For example, you can add custom deals for any given week and include a countdown timer alongside the deal. As a result, clients might be more interested to shop around because they feel you’re forthcoming with your offers. Everything that you see on the LaForat demo website is possible to import using an XML file. So, you don’t really have to do anything other than changing a few header lines here and there. A great theme for beginner businesses, as much as it is for large businesses that have a customer base already.

Try The Fox – Minimal News/Magazine/Blog WordPress Theme with 30+ demos.

Live Preview Here >>

Radians is a modern theme for News/Magazine owners & bloggers with strongly focusing on typography, ease of use and minimalist in design philosophy. It’s suitable for fashion magazine, technology news, traveling writers, book authors, food stylists and so on. Setting it up in no time with detailed documentation included and “Homepage Template” to help you make your site like the demo with one-click.

HOW PEOPLE USE RADIANS

  • cronacheletterarie.com
  • newslab.tribune.com.pk

Setup Homepage with 1-click

Radians included a default homepage template so that you can setup a homepage similar to the demo after counting from 1 to 20.

Any Font you want

800+ Google Fonts to select. You can change the default Google fonts for title, main content text or the special heading fonts. Customizing Radians is your own game.

WooCommerce 6.x compatible

Shop is a mandatory part of any modern WordPress theme. Radians helps you to start selling any stuff with WooCommerce – the best and most popular shop plugin of WordPress (used by 3+ millions websites).

WPBakery Page Builder

WPBakery Page Builder packed in the theme package with all Radians elements + its own elements. You don’t need to pay for this plugin to get elements on the demo.

Most Viewed Widget

See which posts have been read most in your site by the internal counter implemented in Radians. You can display the result in scope a week or by a specific author.

KEY FEATURES

  • WordPress 6.x compatible and will be always compatible with latest versions of WordPress.
  • Gutenberg editor ready.
  • Responsive: Radians looks well on all devices like iPhone, iPad. Sliders also work well with touch and swipe gesture.
  • Mobile Friendly: Check Google Mobile Friendly Tester
  • Retina-ready: It looks beautiful on high-resolution screens like those found on the iPhone, iPad, Kindle Fire HD, Nexus 10, and MacBook Pro with Retina Display.
  • Translation ready: It not only contains default *po file so you can turn your site into any language, but also integrates a “Quick Translation” module to help you translate visual words on the fly.
  • Off-canvas mobile menu: Professional mobile menu integrated into Radians, it looks like Facebook open button on mobile. Just test it yourself on mobile to see it in action.
  • WooCommerce: Radians is compatible with WooCommerce 6.x – the most powerful & popular eCommerce plugin for WordPress. It helps you building a shop easily!
  • Powerful Live Customization with ~ 100 OPTIONS: Radians uses WordPress live customizer to help you setup your site in the most visual way. Options include logo, layout, color, background image, font face, font size, turn ON/OFF almost everything
  • Use ANY FONT: Radians allows you to select 800+ Google fonts and change it for title, heading or main content text.
  • Featured Post System: Radians integrates a featured posts system that’s very easy to use. To set a featured post, click to the star next to that post.
  • Unlimited Colors: Set ANY accent color from color picker and you can see it LIVE.
  • Custom Logo upload: You have option to upload both logo & retina logo. It’s the same for footer logo & footer retina logo. It uses the latest beautiful uploader of WordPress.
  • Social Share icons: All posts are integrated share icons including facebook, twitter, google+ & pinterest.
  • Intelligent related posts system: Related posts are shown right after each post on the blog that helps your readers have more appropriate content to choose and it increases the time that readers stay on your site.
  • Conctact form 7 integrated and you can setup a contact form easily.
  • SEO friendly: Radians designed by HTML5 & CSS3 Standards with carefully calculated tag & heading.
  • Well Documented: Documentation includes tips for you to choose font and use this theme easily
  • Dedicated Support & Lifetime Upgrade: Once purchased the item, you’ll get free update lifetime.

Credits

All images used are taken from Pixabay. You’re free to use any of them.

More Themes

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Resto is a beautiful and very attractive, polished and professional, robust and easy to use, highly responsive WordPress restaurant, bakery, coffee and pizza website theme. Resto has been crafted by an experienced team of developers and designers seeking to furnish webmasters in the foodservice industry to quickly and effortlessly create their own amazing modern websites without having to write so much as a single line of code themselves.

items.description:
Resto is a beautiful and very attractive, polished and professional, robust and easy to use, highly responsive WordPress restaurant, bakery, coffee and pizza website theme. Resto has been crafted by an experienced team of developers and designers seeking to furnish webmasters in the foodservice industry to quickly and effortlessly create their own amazing modern websites without having to write so much as a single line of code themselves.

With Resto, you get access to page builder, enabling you to fully fine-tune your website through entirely visual, drag and drop interfaces, while a wealth of restaurateur-friendly built-in plugins and features, such as beautiful custom Menus, functional Shop pages and much more available within a couple of clicks. With the incredible visual effects furnished by hardware powered Parallax, your visitors will be treated to a delightful end-user experience each time they peruse your delicious Product Menus or expansive Image Galleries. Enhanced at the codebase for SEO, Resto is a capable climber of the search ranks, and will boost your traffic overnight. Fast-loading and lightweight, Resto is the perfect aid for any up and coming restaurant business. Try Resto today!

DEAR VALUE CUSTOMERS!

If some of you have trouble with our theme, especially with sample data installation, please, do not rush to give this theme a negative review. Contact our support at support center or forum instead!

We are confident in our theme and have spent thousands of hours developing and updating it.

Please, help us improve our theme, our documentation, our customer support! Do not put us down without giving us a chance to prove that this theme is an awesome choice. And please, do not hesitate to give our theme a 5-star review if you like it! Help it live a long life and acquire a lot of new awesome features with future updates!

ONE CLICK DEMO IMPORT

All of the beautiful pre-made, homepages, demos, templates and page setups you can see here in the LIVE PREVIEW, are ready to be yours at the simple click of a button. Purchase your copy today, download the installation package and let our one-click installer guide you through the rest of the setup.

SIX SUPER UNIQUE AWESOME HOMEPAGE DESIGNS

Resto comes complete with six homepage designs that we know you are going to love.

From full-colour palette designs to funky sliders and wild animations, and of course all of the functionality required to set your website up as a fully fledged learning institution, it’s all here right out of the box.

TUTORIALS & DOCUMENTATION

WordPress is so advanced these days that many take on the role of the web designer or developer without any training which can be a daunting task!

We recognize this and provide expert guidance via our excellent Video Tutorials and top notch documentation to make sure you get up and running fast.

And if you get stuck, we are here to help! We also offer professional support 24/7 that we are really proud of. We’ll never leave you hanging.

SO MUCH MORE…

The depth and breadth of Resto is really quite extensive and exhaustive, we truly believe not stone has been left unturned and there is so much versatility with what can be done it is a truly multipurpose website theme where the sky’s the limit.

Keeping your Theme up to date is an important security measure which is why Resto has been created using the incredibly smart but often overlooked Child Theme feature.

What this means is that you install and modify your ‘Child’ theme however you choose – using the Editor or via FTP – but you simply update the ‘Parent’ theme when an update is released. And these are included FREE for the Life of the Theme. How good is that?

With super flexible header layouts, Mega Menu options if required, the inclusion of other best practise plugins such as Contact Form 7 and WooCommerce for a fully fledged marketing and ecommerce solution, we just know you are going to LOVE Resto!

THEME FEATURES

  • Responsive – This theme is responsive to give a perfect user experience on all devices.
  • One Click Demo Import – Easiest and fastest way to build your website, one click import pages, post, blog, products, revolution slider, widgets, theme options and more!
  • Slider Revolution plugin included – This theme includes the Slider Revolution plugin, saving you $19.
  • Visual Composer plugin included – This theme includes the Visual Composer plugin, saving you $34.
  • Boxed or full width layout – This can be set globally or even per page!
  • Built on Twitter Bootstrap – Resto uses Twitter Bootstrap. This means that a range of shortcodes are automatically supported. For ease of use you can use the Visual Composer, Easy Bootstrap Shortcode or any other plugins to easily add visuals to your website.
  • WC Marketplace Compatible.
  • WC Vendors Compatible.
  • WC Vendors Compatible.
  • WooCommerce plugin included – This is the most popular WordPress eCommerce plugin. And it’s available for free. Packed full of features, perfectly integrated into your self-hosted WordPress website.
  • Contact Form 7 plugin– this theme includes Contact Form 7 plugin which allows you to manage all your contact forms.
  • Built with Less .css
  • Shortcode Support.
  • Demo content included!
  • Unlimited Color Options.
  • Moveable & Unlimited Sidebars – Move the sidebar to the left, the right, or hide it entirely for a full width page or post! (global or page/post specific).
  • Designed with HTML5 and CSS3.
  • Customizable Design & Code.
  • All installed Extensions are included.
  • Cross Browser Support.
  • Detailed Documentation Included.
  • Full Support.
  • + many more features.
  • More features coming soon.

WHAT OUR CLIENT REVIEWS

The support team is amazing ! Highly responsive, efficient, knowledgeable and most of all generous with their assistance. I am an average level Wordpress user with no inkling of CSS, PHP, HTML, etc but this support was patience with me for my endless questioning and doing their best to solve the issues I face. This is a modern theme design beautifully for spa busniesses. Billy

They help you with every step you need to have the perfect shop theme. Bencher theme is optimized for all the needs you have to create a stunning shop or website/blog. Installing was easy and you have a lot of ready-made homepages to personalizes as you want. Thanks again JWSThemes team! Good job!

Excellent theme and extremely fast customer support. The author is a credit to Themeforest!

100% Satisfied, I think that developer is fabulous and constantly updating is the most good part overall ! They are working constantly and updating as well !!! millions of features make it possible to very good for your all webmasters.

Very clean design but also elegant as well as excellent technical support. I am a newbie and the support team was very helpful and quick to respond walking me through the setup. I was up and running within hours. A really great resource. Thanks for all the help

SUPPORT

If you have any questions about customization of this template witch are not covered in the documentation feel free to ask a question in Forum or Support Center.

IMAGES USED IN THE DEMO

All images used in the demo are not included in the theme. They are all licensed under Creative Commons and credited to their respective creator/owner.

items.name: Marketing Pro - SEO & Agency WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: A stunning visual experience for minimal loving creative. This template is a responsive and retina-ready Wordpress theme with grid system layout. It is optimized for mobile touch and swipe.

items.description:
Most Powerful, All-in-One Marketing WordPress Theme

Marketing Pro is an All-purpose Marketing WordPress theme designed specifically for digital/online marketers, SEO experts & business owners. It is focused on building websites in the marketing, SEO, Landing, small/big business niches. The best thing about this WordPress theme is that, it has 9+ beautifully designed & high converting ready-made templates. The theme comes pre-packed with a drag and drop page builder (Visual Composer) to ensure you can create your website fast and easy without any coding knowledge. It comes with flexible landing page layout & event/conference layout as a bonus. Each niche based layout comes with a different cohesive design & layout. For instance, For digital marketers, we have marketing niche oriented layout and a different one for SEO experts. It is built with shortcodes (element blocks) so that you can build your site from scratch as well. Plus, Marketing Pro includes plenty of options to change the visual style of any elements without ever touching a single line of code.

Marketing Pro Installable Demos: An Overview

 All demos are included with each purchase. Just import demos & build your dream website with ease. Possibilities are limitless!

SEO Demo:

SEO demo has a unique layout that would be perfect for any SEO/digital marketing website that aspires to stand out. Subscription form, pricing table and stunning call to action all are included to capture your audience’s attention.

Marketer Demo:

Are you a digital marketer, Entrepreneur or Motivational speaker? Then look no further! This Digital marketer demo is specially built for those who want to create a powerful image online. Built-in opt-In Form, testimonials and minimalist layout will not only capture audience’s attention but also get you tons of traffic.

Agency Demo:

Agency demo is an intuitive yet flexible homepage demo, designed to suit the needs of agencies of all sizes.With tabs and accordions, case study, pricing list you can be up and running with a full-featured modern agency website in no time.

Business/Corporate Demo:

Business Demo is the perfect Business oriented demo suited for any corporate website. This beautifully designed demo will help businesses to aspire maximum online presence for Corporate Business and Financial Firms. We made it fully Responsive with a strong focus on the smartphone and tablet experience.

Video Demo:

Focused on looking good, Video demo has a full-screen video hero slider that has been styled to have a distinctly modern feel.The demo has been built thinking about the simplicity and perfection. Better less content and functionality, more precision and compatibility.

Online Marketing Demo:

Specifically designed to promote online marketing, Online marketing demo has all the features you ever wanted. If you want to increase your overall conversions this demo should be your first choice.

Landing Page Demo:

landing page demo uses different conversion focused design techniques to quickly drive viewer’s eyes towards trust building testimonials, call-to-action and FAQs.The demo is a perfect fit for any purpose of landing page like business, marketing, agency, startup, app and more.

Social Media Consultant Demo:

Social media consultant demo is a niche demo for those who aspire to be the best in social media business. We carefully built and optimized the demo with all the features you would expect including Opt-in form, CTA and client testimonials.

Event/Conference Demo:

Planning to launch a website for your next event? Then look no further! Event Demo is the perfect demo for any kind of event be it a formal conference or just friendly meet-up. With features like tickets, venues, speakers, time and everything else you can run an event page in no time.

The Core Features

One Click Demo Import

Marketing Pro provides one click demo import feature to help you customize your site in minutes. It works just like magic.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Visual Page Builder ($28 SAVED)

Marketing Pro comes with free Visual Composer, a page builder that offers the tools to create a page with drag and drop without any coding knowledge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
100% Fully Responsive

Marketing Pro’s responsive design adapts to all screen sizes to deliver a top-notch browsing experience. Plus, you can easily disable it from admin panel.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Advanced Theme Options

Marketing Pro theme offers a plethora of options that will help you configure and modify the things around your website more easily.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
600+ Google Fonts

Get full control over theme typography with over 600 Google fonts, font size and font weight control.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Translation Ready

Translate Marketing Pro into any language, or use one of our many included language files. Also, for easier translation, we included .pot file.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
WPML Support

Marketing Pro Theme is a WPML-Certified, which means you can build your website in single or multiple languages.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
5-star Support Team

We know what it’s like to need support. Our philosophy is to treat you as we would like to be treated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Header & Navigation Styles

Marketing Pro provides 6 advanced header types like no other theme can. Pick the one that suits you the best.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Slider Style

Our Plethora of sliders will help you make your website more useful, user friendly and to improve the general look and feel.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Blog Layouts & Styles

Marketing pro theme provides intuitive blog layout with plenty of options to choose from. Plus, it has two different types of blog styles.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Optin Forms

Our Built-in Opt-in forms will allow you to create beautiful optin forms that are optimized for highest conversion rates. All cohesive – your site will look like a big trusted brand!
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Accordion and Toggle

With marketing pro’s advanced accordion and toggle options, you can make eye-catching categorised content blocks in a second.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Pricing Tables

Marketing pro comes with clean and crisp pricing tables to showcase your plans, offers, prices in style.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Browser Compatibility

all the templates are meticulously tested by our developers to ensure it looks perfect in every browser.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Creative Elements Shortcodes

We included a great deal of pre-built shortcodes to use all different theme elements in any page you want. Mix and match them and make your website unique!
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Lifetime Update

We care about our customers more than anything. That’s why we will provide lifetime updates for marketing pro theme for free!
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

Keywords: marketing, wordpress theme, seo wordpress theme, digital marketing, affiliate marketing, online marketing, seo, agency, corporate, business, agency, social media expert, consultant



Best Ever WordPress Theme for Marketers, SEO experts, Bloggers & Business Owners!

Marketing Pro is the best solution for digital/online marketers & small/big business owners. We know that, you’ve always wanted a conversion focused WordPress theme that will turn your website visitors into paying customers, clients & email subscribers. We’ve created layouts to help you achieve that. We’ve gone extra mile to include event demo & landing page demo for you as a bonus. Overall design is clean & professional. Marketing Pro is SEO friendly and light weight. It’s time to take your inbound marketing to next level!

Pre-Sale FAQs

Q: Do all the demos come with one flat price?

A: Absolutely! It’s a one-time price. You get all the demos (all pages, element block, everything).

Q: Do I have to pay for updates?

A: Updates are provided free for lifetime, that means for as long as theme is available on ThemeForest/Envato Market.

Q: Does Marketing Pro come with a page builder?

 A: Yes, it comes with Visual Composer, a premium drag-and-drop plugin that comes free with the theme. It allows you to create pages with ease.

Q: Do I need to build website from scratch?

A. NO! You can start with our pre-made demos as seen on our live preview. You can start from there and tweak those layouts. However, you can start from scratch with a blank page with Drag & Drop Visual Composer.

Perfomy is a WordPress theme to create a website for online store especially related to perfumes, jewelry and accessories. Perfomy comes with a shop to offer different type of layouts like products carousel, products with filteration, awesome promotion banners etc. The shop is built with Woocommerce the popular and flexible plugin in eCommerce. Furthermore, Perfomy is developed based on powerful plugins such as WPBakery Page Builder, Slider Revolution, WooCommerce, WPML and a robust admin panel allowing you to setup, configure your site the way you want without any coding experiences required.

You will be totally surprised with the power of this theme. Ready to explore it right now?

WHY SHOULD CHOOSE PERFOMY?

Perfomy is professional ecommerce theme with neat and smooth design suitable for elegant online store. Theme comes with plenty of important features required for today’s internet business. It’s fully responsive for all sorts of mobile / tablet / laptop devices. Layouts and design meet all trends of 2017’s web design.

There is bunch of pre-designed layouts and pages which can be easily used and imported from demo data. Package of theme is packed with powerful features, such as, WPBakery Page Builder, WPML (multilingual compatibility), revolution slider, advanced admin, google fonts, shortcode support, less.css, etc. Everything what comes on template can be edited, customized or changed in admin. No need for coding skills. Therefore, product is suitable and recommended for beginners with WordPress as well. With attached documentation, support and updates you will be able to setup everything by yourself. I would definitely recommend to have a look on live previews and pre-designed versions of the theme. items.name: Medicalist - A Medical Theme with Appointment System

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Doctors and Hospitals theme

items.description:
Being an all-inclusive, all-purpose and all-managed medical theme, this (Medicalist) Medical WordPress Theme reduces the customization cost to zero! You can use it for Eye Care, Hair Loss, Doctors, Dentists, Clinics, Hospitals, Labs, Hematology Services, Drug Stores, and so on. Get 5+ unique demos, 29+ pages, 10+ blog styles, 6+ gallery styles and 3+ medical shop management styles – all in one product. Each homepage is specialized for a specific medical niche. Also manage the team, timetable, services, appointments, event, departments, products, payments and news in multiple styles.

4 Reasons to Choose Medicalist

1. Appointment Booking System

If you like to develop a portal in which a client or a patient wants to make an appointment then through Medicalist you can make an appointment booking portal. This is a complete system of appointments in which date-wise and time-wise appointments can be made by the client.

2. Free Premium Plugins

For page building we have given WPBakery page builder which is available free of cost(You save $64). Other than this, the Revolution slider is given free (YOU save $29), which helps you build the slides with a powerful backend. If you use our theme for building a hospital website and you want to build a system to allow users to Donate Blood then we have given a Blood Donation System in a plugin. There is a Pregnancy Calculator integrated in Medicalist WP theme which can be used in a Gynaecologist website.

3. Home Page Layout for 6 Medical Niches

Be a Dentist, Psychologist, Haematologist, or any other medical specialist. Our theme suits your niche the best. Also for a pharmaceutical company, a Medicalist theme can be used. A complete demo is also included for Health Insurance companies. Overall 6 niche-based demos are given which are usable for different medical-related niches.

4. Pregnancy Calculator For Gynaecologist

Use a demo of our theme and make a website for Gynaecologists with a Pregnancy Calculator so that the clients can use this feature while using the appointment booking feature. This is a wonderful feature and it will give the doctor more clients.

items.name: Economist - Business and Finance WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Economist is a sophisticated business WordPress theme that's ideal for any finance or professional services company looking to make a great first impression.

items.description:
Can I see the online documentation?
You can view all of the theme’s documentation, including the install guide right here.

Do I get the images used on the demo site?
No, these were sourced from shutterstock.com and cannot be distributed within the theme. It’s intended you use your own to put your own stamp on the design. For free images, check out the excellent unsplash.com

Does Economist come with a page builder?
Yes, it comes with WPBakery, the most popular drag-and-drop page builder plugin for WordPress that comes free with the theme. It allows you to build fully custom pages by mixing and matching the existing elements.

Can I use the theme on multiple sites with a single purchase?
Nothing will stop you, but note that each license can be activated on one WordPress site at a time. You will get updates and support for the one you activate.


Why is Economist right for you?

  • We’ve researched your industry – After spending many hours studying hundreds of financial websites we wanted to create a best in class theme for your business with every element carefully considered.
  • Easy to use! – before we made themes for a living we bought them just like you. We grew tired and frustrated of themes that we’re impossible to figure out how to use. Our customers love how we setup our themes to be easy to manage and intuitive to figure out in minutes. Thousands of happy customers have told us we’re doing it right!
  • Setup in minutes! – you can quickly recreate a website similar to our demo site in minutes using our one click installer. Don’t waste hours reading manuals to get up and running – get your website built faster so you can start selling today.
  • Best in class, super fast code! – we take code quality very seriously. Our themes load like lightning which is so important for small businesses.
  • Optimized for SEO – Economist is fully compatible with the leading SEO plugin on the market, Yoast SEO and passes Google’s Structured Data Testing Test Tool.
  • World class support! – when you do need help we’re here for you. Our customers rave about our world class support team.

Overview

  • WordPress 5.0+ Ready
  • 100% focused on world class design best practices
  • Perfect design and features for any consulting and professional services business!
  • Fully Responsive! Strong focus on the smartphone and tablet experience
  • Unlimited Color and Typography options
  • CommerceGurus Toolkit – our very own WordPress plugin included to enhance WordPress
  • Step by Step Video Guides
  • Detailed Documentation
  • Child theme included!
  • 5 Star Rated Elite Themeforest Authors
  • World Class Support

Layout Features

  • Boxed or Full Width Layout
  • Mobile friendly and Retina-ready design
  • Sticky Header Option
  • WPBakery included worth $46!
  • Beautifully designed Shortcodes
  • Left, Right or no Sidebars on the News Template
  • Use Background Photos or patterns

Header Features

  • Adjust the height of the Logo and Header
  • Change the Colors to match your brand
  • Change the typography with loads of Theme Options
  • LayerSlider included worth $25!
  • Create Unlimited Sliders

Pages

  • Contact Page
  • About Page and beautiful pages to help attract world class people to work in your business
  • Solutions
  • Customer Stories
  • Left and Right Sidebar Options
  • Testimonials

EASY TO CUSTOMIZE

  • Background Photo and Pattern Uploader
  • Change the Colors to match your Brand
  • Show 2 Footers or just 1
  • Fully Customizable Design: set your Color and Font for each Typographic Selector
  • Built-in Google Fonts. Over 650 Web Fonts support with Preview

AND ALSO…

  • SEO Optimized HOT
  • Child Theme Support
  • Bootstrap 3 Grid
  • 404 Error Page
  • Unlimited Contact forms with JS Validation HOT
  • Video Tutorials and Demo Data

One Click Demo Data Install

Installing the Economist theme demo data takes just minutes allowing you to get up and running in no time at all. The sample images are not included in the theme due to copyright reasons and are replaced with grey placeholders.

items.description:
A. Introduction

GLOBAL SEO is the Perfect SEO, Marketing & Business WordPress theme. GLOBAL SEO is best suited for corporate website like SEO, Marketing, Consulting Firms etc. GLOBAL SEO is Fully Responsive! Strong focus on the smartphone and tablet experience

Because of that we create GLOBAL SEO which is a Marketing/SEO WordPress Theme that fit all of your need.

If you like GLOBAL SEO – Marketing And SEO Responsive WordPress Theme please rate it!

Drag & Drop Page Builder – Visual Composer ($34 saved)

Fast, intuitive and smart page builder will make your customizations fast and easy. Your custom layout will be ready for publishing in a minute!

Slider Revolution is an innovative, responsive WordPress Slider Plugin that displays your content the beautiful way. Whether it’s a Slider, Carousel, Hero Scene or even a whole Front Page, the visual, drag & drop editor will let you tell your own stories in no time!

WPML & Translation Ready

Translate your website to any language with WPML easily! Use .pot files for a custom translations.

Custom Sidebars and Widgets

Compatible with Contact form 7

Finance Press is compatible with the most powerful and most popular custom contact forms WordPress widget! create your own forms in seconds!

Child theme compatible

Finance Press enables you to easily override default template files using a child theme. It also enables you updating your theme in the safe way!

Powerful framework

Finance Press is based on most popular, well established, powerful Redux Framework theme options framework!

Detailed documentation

Extensive documentation plus great video guides on how to setup and customize Finance Press will make your customisations super easy and fast!

24-Hour Turnaround Support

items.name: Material - Electronics WooCommerce WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Material is a beautiful Multi-Purpose WooCommerce WordPress Theme that is ultra-responsive to gadgets of all sizes. Your site will look equally gorgeous whether it is a mobile device, a laptop or a tablet. This theme is the perfect epitome of simplicity, elegance, and robust functions, all combined under one name. With this theme, you can easily turn your website into an online store and instantly start selling your products.

items.description:
Material is a WooCommerce multipurpose WordPress theme oriented to electronics selling. It has been built to work on all kinds of devices and gadgets. Material is a high quality, high resolution theme for technology pursuers. It uses Mega Menu for its page organization and WPBakery Page Builder for its design. Reviews have praised this theme to a high level. Its most important feature is the use of WooCommerce. Material is great to promote online versions of physically existent electronics shops. This will allow you to get a wider audience and expand your targets by knowing better their needs.

Material is a customizable one-click demo install theme (with 03 pre-launched demos and 3 homepages!). It has a very committed contact support team at your disposal. Design is malleable and easy to use, like its Theme Options Panel. They are both quick and intuitive because there is no coding required. Material uses RTL, Shortcodes and unlimited sidebars. You can arrange posts within 4 main columns. Moreover, you will have access to lots of premade layouts and templates and an unlimited set of colors. It is compatible with all browsers on the market. Take a look and start your new online shop now with Material!

ONE CLICK DEMO IMPORT

All of the beautiful pre-made , homepages, demos, templates and page setups you can see here in the Live Preview, are ready to be yours at the simple click of a button. Purchase your copy today, download the installation package and let our one-click installer guide you through the rest of the setup.

WHAT OUR CLIENT REVIEWS

The support team is amazing ! Highly responsive, efficient, knowledgeable and most of all generous with their assistance. I am an average level Wordpress user with no inkling of CSS, PHP, HTML, etc but this support was patience with me for my endless questioning and doing their best to solve the issues I face. This is a modern theme design beautifully for spa busniesses. Billy

– by copycat1968

I am very happy with the theme I purchased. The creative team made a great job for making it very modern and easy to use. I also pleased with the customer support. They help you with every step you need to have the perfect shop theme. Bencher theme is optimized for all the needs you have to create a stunning shop or website/blog. Installing was easy and you have a lot of ready-made homepages to personalizes as you want. Thanks again JWSThemes team! Good job!

– by OFFBEATVISION 2

Excellent theme and extremely fast customer support. The author is a credit to Themeforest!

– by alexzazz

100% Satisfied, I think that developer is fabulous and constantly updating is the most good part overall ! They are working constantly and updating as well !!! millions of features make it possible to very good for your all webmasters.

– by Gaven-Creative

Very clean design but also elegant as well as excellent technical support. I am a newbie and the support team was very helpful and quick to respond walking me through the setup. I was up and running within hours. A really great resource. Thanks for all the help

– by leebrosus

THEME FEATURES

  • Responsive – This theme is responsive to give a perfect user experience on all devices.
  • WC Marketplace Compatible.
  • WC Vendors Compatible.
  • WC Vendors Compatible.
  • One Click Demo Import – Easiest and fastest way to build your website, one click import pages, post, blog, products, revolution slider, widgets, theme options and more!
  • Slider Revolution plugin included – This theme includes the Slider Revolution plugin, saving you $26.
  • WPBakery Page Builder plugin included – This theme includes the WPBakery Page Builder plugin, saving you $46.
  • Boxed or full width layout – This can be set globally or even per page!
  • Built on Twitter Bootstrap – Material uses Twitter Bootstrap. This means that a range of shortcodes are automatically supported. For ease of use you can use the Visual Composer, Easy Bootstrap Shortcode or any other plugins to easily add visuals to your website.
  • WooCommerce plugin included – This is the most popular WordPress eCommerce plugin. And it’s available for free. Packed full of features, perfectly integrated into your self-hosted WordPress website.
  • Contact Form 7 plugin– this theme includes Contact Form 7 plugin which allows you to manage all your contact forms.
  • Built with Less .css
  • Shortcode Support.
  • Demo content included!
  • Unlimited Color Options.
  • Moveable & Unlimited Sidebars – Move the sidebar to the left, the right, or hide it entirely for a full width page or post! (global or page/post specific).
  • Designed with HTML5 and CSS3.
  • Customizable Design & Code.
  • All installed Extensions are included.
  • Cross Browser Support.
  • Detailed Documentation Included.
  • Full Support.
  • + many more features.
  • More features coming soon.

NEED SUPPORT

  • Availability of the author to answer questions.
  • Answering technical questions about item’s features.
  • Assistance with reported bugs and issues.
  • Help with included 3rd party assets.

If you have any questions about customization of this template witch are not covered in the documentation feel free to ask a question in Forum or Support Center.

items.name: Hotel Xenia - Resort & Booking WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Hotel & Resort WordPress Theme

items.description:
HOTEL XENIA Hotel, Hostel, Apartment Booking WordPress Theme by Plethora Themes on Themeforest. Hotel Xenia features a clean and elegant design tailored to suit the global hotel, hostel, resort, apartment, b&b room reservation and hospitality industry. This versatile WordPress theme, is suited for all kinds of hotels, motels, youth hostels, resorts, bed and breakfast, rooms for rent and accommodation sites. It is so flexible that can serve any Travel Site Project as well!

Included with your download is the industry standard, powerful Page Builder plugin Visual Composer, and a plethora of theme options. HOTEL-XENIA could potentially be used to build virtually any kind of website design and layout. The options are limitless.

Built on the solid framework for WordPress, Redux, means that your new website will be well organised and include many incredible theme options so that everything you need is right before you.

Tested for compatibility with many popular plugins, HOTEL-XENIA is a multi use theme that is translation compatible for any LTR language around the world.

Adhering to the WordPress philosophy: “great software should work with little configuration and setup”, HOTEL-XENIA, with its one-click demo importer, can be set up and be completely functional in a matter of minutes. With no coding on your part required.

All of our WordPress Themes are powered by our very own ‘Features Library’, an innovative and thoroughly tested framework which enables the users to customize and extend almost every aspect of the theme easily and reliably.

Reservations and Booking handling

HOTEL-XENIA does not use an automated system to handle availabilities and booking. It uses advanced Contact and Booking forms that send booking request emails to the administrator so that he or she can confirm them manually. Of cource you can always connect it with other booking plugins or your own booking system and we have done some extra work to make that more easy. In the Rooms Custom post type you can set prices in various ways. We also included the ability to put a price on various services and book them too!

Included Plugins

  • WPBakery Visual Composer is included in all our themes and customized with extra options and shortcodes! Plethora Themes is legally authorized by the plugin author ( WPBakery ) to distribute the fully featured Visual Composer plugin along with this theme. Technical support for theme bundled Visual Composer plugin is provided solely by Plethora Themes. Plugin updates are provided via the theme, meaning that the latest approved Visual Composer plugin version will always be included on each theme update (related admin notices appear, so you will not miss it!).

Free Plugins from WP Plugin Repository, used in the demos

  • WP Google Maps (Resort Demo)
  • MailChimp for WordPress (Resort Demo) For creating all newsletter forms.
  • Contact Form 7 (All demos). The booking request forms rely on this plugin.

Tested & Compatible Popular Plugins

  • WPML (Premium – NOT included) for multilingual support
  • Slider Revolution (Premium – NOT included) Compatible with our themes and can be used in all slider positions to replace Plethora’s OWL Slider.
  • Yoast SEO (WP Plugin Repository)
  • WP Cache plugins such as WP Super Cache and W3 Total Cache (WP Plugin Repository)

Features

  • Translation Ready
  • Responsive Design
  • Extreme Flexibility
  • Powerful theme options and per-Page integration also!
  • Unlimited Color Variations
  • Unlimited custom Sidebars
  • Integration with Google Web Fonts
  • Plethora’s custom integration of OWL sliders
  • Parallax Backgrounds
  • Video Backgrounds
  • WoW CSS3 animation Library
  • Lightbox functionality
  • AJAX page loading functionality
  • Thematic Icon Libraries | We have 3 Libraries by default
  • Posts List, Grid and Masonry shortcodes
  • Buttons with icons
  • Teaser Box shortcode
  • Testimonials shortcode and custom post type
  • Contact and Booking request forms
  • Responsive Fixed Ratio Elements (16:9, 4:3, 1:1 and more)
  • Custom Plethora Widgets
  • One Pager functionality included
  • Sticky or Fixed Header with many variations and states
  • Hover or Click menu option
  • One-Click Demo Imports
  • SEO Friendly Clean Code
  • Activate/deactivate unneeded post types, shortcodes and widgets.
  • Advanced Child Theme Functionality: Quickly override existing features with a simple copy-paste in your Child Theme.
  • Full compatibility with PHP 7.4. PHP 7.4 equals to significantly faster loading times, better memory management and improved security.
  • Full Online Documentation
  • FAST Support and Updates

NOTES:
- The images that are presented in the demo are not distributed by the theme and are not included in the package that you download, due to copyright issues.
- This theme requires PHP v5.4 or newer. Unfortunately we cannot ignore the fact that older versions are outdated and non secure. We always advise to switch to the latest PHP version available ( v5.6 or even better v7.0 )
- Media Attributions: City Hotel Demo: Metro Centric

5 Star Reviews

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Financial is a serious and professional, robust and reliable, smooth and stylish, fast-loading and readily responsive WordPress financial and business multipurpose website theme. Financial has been created to provide businesses and corporations across a broad spectrum of industries and fields, though peculiarly well suited for the financial, consulting and investment sectors.

items.description:
Financial is a serious and professional, robust and reliable, smooth and stylish, fast-loading and readily responsive WordPress financial and business multipurpose website theme. Financial has been created to provide businesses and corporations across a broad spectrum of industries and fields, though peculiarly well suited for the financial, consulting and investment sectors. Financial has been created to transmit a clean-cut, polished and pixel perfect visual end-user experience for your potential clients or business partners, with seamless graphical detailing powered by cutting edge HTML5, CSS3, Parallax, AJAX and Bootstrap technologies working in unison to make your page loads lightning-fast, your animations fluid and seamless and your functionality spot-on and diverse. Requiring absolutely no coding skills, Financial lets you create your financial company website through the intuitive WPBakery Page Builder drag and drop premium page builder plugin, as well as create engaging sliders and stunning carousels easily with the Revolution Slider premium builder plugin. Establish a firm online presence for your company today, with Financial!

Performance test from North America – USA – Washington D.C

ONE CLICK DEMO IMPORT

All of the beautiful pre-made , homepages, demos, templates and page setups you can see here in the LIVE PREVIEW, are ready to be yours at the simple click of a button. Purchase your copy today, download the installation package and one-click installer guide you through the rest of the setup.

Purely a marketing theme, not only the design is traditional according to the niche but also the scripts and features are wonderful. Well done – a new and fresh air in Finance related themes.

– by webinane

THEME FEATURES

  • Responsive – This theme is responsive to give a perfect user experience on all devices.
  • One Click Demo Import – Easiest and fastest way to build your website, one click import pages, post, blog, products, revolution slider, widgets, theme options and more!
  • Yahoo Finance API – Get Realtime Stock Quotes using Yahoo Finance API.
  • Slider Revolution plugin included – This theme includes the Slider Revolution plugin, saving you $19.
  • WPBakery Page Builder plugin included – This theme includes the WPBakery Page Builder plugin, saving you $34.
  • Stock Market News from Stockdio- a plugin and a widget that provide the means to display a list of stock market news, for any given stock exchange and symbol. Over 65 different stock exchanges and a large number of market indices, currencies and commodities are supported.
  • Boxed or full width layout – This can be set globally or even per page!
  • Built on Twitter Bootstrap – Financial uses Twitter Bootstrap. This means that a range of shortcodes are automatically supported. For ease of use you can use the WPBakery Page Builder, Easy Bootstrap Shortcode or any other plugins to easily add visuals to your website.
  • Built with Less .css
  • Switch to Right to Left.
  • Shortcode Support.
  • Demo content included!
  • Unlimited Color Options.
  • Moveable & Unlimited Sidebars – Move the sidebar to the left, the right, or hide it entirely for a full width page or post! (global or page/post specific).
  • Designed with HTML5 and CSS3.
  • Customizable Design & Code.
  • All installed Extensions are included.
  • Cross Browser Support.
  • Detailed Documentation Included.
  • Full Support.
  • + many more features.
  • More features coming soon.

ONLINE SUPPORT

If you have any questions about customization of this template witch are not covered in the documentation feel free to ask a question in the Community Forum.

Save time and headaches. An installation service will setup your theme for free. Please, open a ticket to support center. We will support to you.

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: A theme generated by http://www.artofthemes.com

items.description:
Proflex is a truly multi-purposed design, suitable for corporate, creative or other web environments. The theme features a versatile and diverse catalog of particles, to enrich your site content. Proflex is an admirable, clean design with a fresh approach for the ever-changing Web.

Proflex is Bootstrap based HTML5/CSS3 also includes one of the greatest options panel with Redux Framework. You can easily change any theme color.

Proflex comes with a nice selection of post formats for displaying different types of content on your blog, including galleries, images, videos, quotes, and links.




  • Header Options
  • Sticky Header
  • Footer Options
  • Boxed/Wide layout
  • Advanced Typography Options
  • Redux FrameWork for Powerful Theme Options Panel
  • Revolution Slider included for FREE (Save 25$)
  • Visual Composer included for FREE (Save 34$)
  • Essential Grid Premium Plugin included for FREE (Save 26$)
  • Ultimate Addons for Visual Composer Premium Plugin included for FREE (Save 18$)
  • MegaMenu for Visual Composer Premium Plugin included for FREE (Save 14$)
  • Contact Form 7 ready
  • Google Fonts Included
  • Unlimited Colors
  • Font Awesome Icons
  • One Click Install Demo Data
  • Built in with HTML5, CSS3 & SASS
  • Custom Post Formats: Standard, Gallery, Link, Quote, Video, Audio
  • Responsive
  • Google Maps
  • Cross Browser Compatibility
  • Child Theme included to help you make the most out of it.
  • Coming Soon, Under Construction and 404 pages
  • Custom Page Templates & Page Options Included
  • Proflex is completely ready to be translated in your language. Just translate the included language file. Also, compatible with POLYLANG & WPML
  • WooCommerce compatibility
  • Retina ready

 

Ultimate Addon Elements

Icons: You can use this element to integrate a simple icon (font & image, both kinds) in your page and use it as you want. Or you can utilize Visual Composer grids and display a list of logos of your clients, partners, sponsors, etc.

Info Box: Perhaps, the most popular trend right now, Info Boxes truly make your website stand out helping you highlight the important things you have on offer.

Info List: Traditional HTML lists are boring, aren’t they? This elements simply re-imagines the lists. You may take an opportunity and utilize it’s cool design to show some process or simply highlight your most popular / related products, services & features.

Flip Box: This element combines the power of “Info Box” & “Call to Action” block all together. On the front, it would look like a normal Info Box but as visitor hovers on the block, it flips with a cool CSS3 effect and shows a Call to Action section, provoking him to take a call.

Counter: Want to show your milestones, achievements and any other numeric statistics with animated numbers? This element will help!

Interactive Banner: Many times, image banners come in handy as they are very convenient and obvious way to deliver your message precisely. This element will display those image blocks in a nicer & interactive way.

Modal Popup Box: This is one of the very useful element that can go on any website. Create modal popup boxes and embed anything you wish inside the popup box through easy WYSIWYG editor.

Timeline: Display a timeline in a Facebook style or simply showcase your features, process or highlights little creatively. We have taken special efforts with custom JavaScript & CSS codes to make it as perfect as possible.

Extended Google Maps: Visual Composer comes with Google Maps element by default. But our Extended Googles Maps element uses latest APIs and allows you to do more with it. Upload marker images, write custom HTML in map info box and control everything that goes with map.

Row Backgrounds

Creative backgrounds do truly set the tone for your website. So we offer you easy tools that will help you utilize them quickly.

Features

Fixed Image Background
Keeps the image fixed at it’s position while the other content moves on scroll.

Vertical & Horizontal Parallax
The background moves at different speed & direction from your content on scroll.

Hover Parallax
The background moves creatively with cursor movement.

Video Background -
Plays a video in the background. Supports hosted as well as YouTube videos.

Multilayer Hover Parallax -
Design a real 3D parallax. Go ahead – impress your users

Change Log

Updates, 23-May-2017

# Updated, Slider Revolution Plugin
# Updated, Visual Composer Page Builder Plugin

items.description:
New Version: v1.7 | Changelog

Why Fundraising Theme?

Our demos will quickly show you a lot of reasons why Fundraising is probably the most compact, user friendly Charity/Donation WordPress Theme of the moment. The theme only comes with specific options and features, build by professionals for professionals. The most important part of the theme is that it comes built-in with a lot of services which actually are “Ready to go” after importing the demo on your site.

Fundraising Theme was created to simplify the process of having a well-done website, for any Charity, Nonprofit or any other type of Nonprofit organisation!

[NEW] - Instagram feed engine. The integrated instagram feed from the theme stopped working because of the Instagram API limitation. From now the theme will include the Instagram Feed Plugin.;
[NEW] - WordPress v5.4 compatibility;
[NEW] - WooCommerce v4.x compatibility;
[UPDATED] - All outdated WooCommerce templates files from the theme;

[IMPROVED] - JS Custom Code;

[UPDATED] - All bundled plugins are now updated to their latest versions;
[UPDATED] - All bundled outdated WooCommerce templates;
[IMPROVED] - SEO (Empty alt attributes are now filled);
[FIXED] - A bug with the sidebar positioning on Blog Category/Search/Tags/Author templates;
=== Released v1.5 – 23-JUN-2018 === 
[UPDATED] - All bundled plugins are now updated to their latest versions; 
[UPDATED] - All outdated woocommerce files from the theme; 
[NEW] - WooCommerce v3.4.0 compatibility added;
=== Released v1.3 – 02-JUL-2017 === 
[NEW] - All plugins are now bundled as Pre-Packaged into the theme;
[NEW] - WooCommerce v3.x compatibility has been added;
[IMPROVED] - Widgetized Shortcode sidebar styling when using with VC Plugin (for custom pages);
[IMPROVED] - Shop Archive UX(Minor changes to product title);
[UPDATED] - All plugins are now updated to their latest version;
[UPDATED] - All WooCommerce templates are now updated to their latest version (v3.x +);
=== Released v1.2 – 02-MAR-2017 === 
[FIXED] - Minor styling issues;
[NEW] - Fancy Gallery shortcode comes now with clickable fancybox popup;
[UPDATED] - ThemeSLR Framework to version v1.2(To get the latest version of the plugin, remove it and reinstall it through the Begin Install plugin notice from your admin panel);
=== Released v1.1 – 26-FEB-2017 === 
[NEW] - Header 3 layout;
[NEW] - Added Demo data as XML files in main-package;
[IMPROVED] - Events Single page layout;
[IMPROVED] - Theme Options Panel/Donations tab(Supporter Settings were added);
[IMPROVED] - Search form position on hover has been improved;
[FIXED] - Minor styling issues were fixed;
[FIXED] - Navigation Level 2 Hover overflow issue has been fixed;
[UPDATED] - .pot translation file has been updated;
=== Released v1.0 – 23-FEB-2017 === 
[RELEASED] - v1.0;

What is ListingProWP?

ListingProWP is an end-to-end WordPress directory & listing solution and no extra paid plugins are required. An All-in-One turn-key solution to build and monetize your online directory in all 7 continents.

THEME REVIEW – FAQ

Check out the review of the Car Dealer WordPress Theme.

  • Can the Car Dealer WordPress theme be used for single and multiple dealerships?

    Yes, the theme is very flexible and suits any car selling businesses, be it a single or multiple dealership. If you want to use the theme for a single dealership, you can simply disable the account login form. This way, nobody else will be able to create accounts and post car ads.

  • How many languages does the Car Dealer theme support?

    The current theme version is in English, but we are going to include additional languages in future theme updates. Nevertheless, the theme can be easily translated; it includes the needed PO files which can be translated to any other language using plugins like LocoTranslate.

  • Can I build a website that uses your Car Dealership WordPress theme and works with several languages?

    You can easily add a multilingual feature to your website using a plugin like WPML. This is the best solution for multilingual websites, so we made sure that the Car Dealer WordPress Theme is 100% compatible with WPML.

  • Can I use the purchased theme on several websites?

    Due to the single license policy, a purchased theme can be used on a single website. You will need to purchase the Car Dealer WordPress Theme again if you want to use it on another website.

  • Are the colors customizable on every field?

    You can easily customize the colors, making the theme fit your project and business’ color scheme. A custom CSS field is also included, allowing you to alter any specific element, and thus make it match your specific preferences.

  • Do you provide free install service of your Car Dealer WordPress theme?

    Yes, we provide a free service install demo data for you. After buy theme, you can open the ticket to our support center or open the topic to our community forums. We will check and import demo data.

  • Do you provide customizations of your Car Dealer WordPress theme?

    We do not provide theme customizations. However, we offer support for our products, so we will fix any bugs, errors, etc. You can always hire a programmer if you want to customize the theme for your needs, of course.

  • I have submitted a ticket on Saturday night. It’s Monday now, and I haven’t received a reply yet. How long should I wait?
